title: Is a 100% slow on Ashe possible?
body:
So I was thinking since the passive slow scales off of crit and frozen mallet is an on-hit item, would a full crit Ashe with Frozen Mallet and Guinsoo's be able to slow for 100%?

I would test it myself but I can't and I just had to know.

replies.body: Nope, slows cap. Thresh's 99% slow isn't 99% for example.
Additionally only the strongest slow on a target has effect, so in this case Frozen Mallet's not contributing anything either.
The lowest movement speed possible is 110.
Someone had a video of 100% slow Nami (probably Vandril). It needed RNG lottery with like tripple infernal + elder + blue buff (back when it gave ap), and a no-boot full build.

The only champion that could reach 100% slow was Nami, but I think that got patched out.
Not that you'd ever see it though because of how much AP you'd need to make it happen.
